summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Kilbourne Street, in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks from Corliss Avenue to Ashworth Avenue, cross walks and other appurtenances, in accordance with Resolution No. 617 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
